Financials_Business_Process_Parameters.description: When set to "true" or "1", the business process is automatically processed. This means that all approvals will be automatically approved in the system, all reviews and to-do's will be automatically by-passed, and all notifications will be automatically suppressed.

description: Element that contains the change purchase item spend category request data.

validation.validation: The request name, current spend category, and new spend category can't be changed while you're editing a request
The selected purchase items are on a worksheet that is already in draft or in progress. Please remove: [purchase items]
The current spend category's alternate item identifier types must be a subset of the new spend category's alternate item identifier types.
The current and new spend categories must have same spend category usage types.
The current and new spend category's track item setting must be the same.
The current and new spend category's stock item setting must be the same.
The current and new spend categories can not be the same.
The selected purchase items with linked catalog items are only allowed when the catalog item's spend category matches the new spend category. Please remove: [catalog items]
The selected purchase items already have a change purchase item spend category request in progress. Please remove: [purchase items]
You can select only 1 code for each commodity code type.
The selected purchase item is not valid for the current spend category.
Please select less than 100 purchase items.
You can't select a UNSPSC or NIGP type alternate item identifier when you select a commodity code. Either remove the commodity code or the alternate item identifier.
